channel.title: Ants on MKLau
channel.description: Recent content in Ants on MKLau

item.title: Released! Draft *Aphaenogaster* genomes
item.description: Just finished the final assembly of draft genomes for six species of seed ants from the genus Aphaenogaster. You can read the pre-print of the paper here. The sequences will be released on NCBI in May 2018 check them out here.

item.title: Harvard Forest Postdoctoral Fellowship
item.description: I have accepted an invitation to conduct postdoctoral studies at Harvard Forest (Harvard Univeristy) to continue my research on the impacts of genetic variation on ecological networks. I’ll be working with Dr. Aaron Ellison who has studied the impacts of ecological disturbance on a broad variety of ecological systems.
